entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something I bought. And honestly, this whole thing is already a pain.
I understand your frustration, I'll do my best to help. Can you tell me what you're trying to return?
It's the VeloBand Pulse. The heart rate monitor smart watch thingy. I got it a little while ago, and it's just not working out for me.
Okay, I can certainly help with processing a return for your VeloBand Pulse. Do you have your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Yes, it's baker.julian@email.com. Hurry this up. I'm busy.

Thank you, Mr. Baker. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse purchased on... Yes, I have it right here. Our return policy allows for returns within 90 days for a full refund. Is the item in its original packaging and in good condition?
Yeah, whatever. It's all there. Just get me the refund. I don't understand why this is so difficult.

I apologize for any inconvenience. To initiate the return, I'll need to generate a return shipping label for you. This will be emailed to baker.julian@email.com. Simply print the label, attach it to the package, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, we'll process your refund.
Fine. Just send the label. Will I get the full amount back?

Yes, sir. You will receive a full refund for the purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse. It should reflect in your account within 7-10 business days after we receive the returned item. You'll receive a confirmation email when the refund is processed.
Okay. That's... better. So, I have 90 days to actually ship it back, right?

That's correct, you have 90 days from today to ship it back to us per our return policy. I will be sure to add detailed instructions in the email, in case you need to reference it later. Please note, we do check the condition of returned smart watch products upon arrival.
Alright. I appreciate you sorting that out. Thanks.
You're very welcome, Mr. Baker. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Have a wonderful day! Thank you for choosing VeloFit.
